TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MaskedTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 使用遮罩區別適當及不適當的使用者輸入。

span.span: Uses a mask to distinguish between proper and improper user input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是增強型支援宣告式語法，以接受或拒絕使用者輸入的控制項。The class is an enhanced control that supports a declarative syntax for accepting or rejecting user input. 使用屬性，您可以指定下列輸入而不需要撰寫任何自訂驗證邏輯應用程式中：Using the property, you can specify the following input without writing any custom validation logic in your application: - 必要的輸入的字元。Required input characters. - 選擇性的輸入的字元。Optional input characters. - 輸入遮罩; 中的指定位置中預期的類型例如，數字或字母或英數字元。The type of input expected at a given position in the mask; for example, a digit, or an alphabetic or alphanumeric character. - 遮罩常值或應出現直接在字元; 例如連字號 （-） 中的電話號碼或在價格的貨幣符號。Mask literals, or characters that should appear directly in the ; for example, the hyphens (-) in a phone number, or the currency symbol in a price. - 輸入的字元; 的特殊處理例如，如果要轉換為大寫的字母字元。Special processing for input characters; for example, to convert alphabetic characters to uppercase. 當控制項會顯示在執行階段，它表示成一系列的提示字元和選擇性的常值字元的遮罩。When a control is displayed at run time, it represents the mask as a series of prompt characters and optional literal characters. 每個可編輯遮罩的位置，表示必要或選擇性的輸入，會顯示與單一的提示字元。Each editable mask position, representing a required or optional input, is shown with a single prompt character. 例如，數字符號 （#） 是通常用於做為預留位置的數字字元的輸入。For example, the number sign (#) is often used as a placeholder for a numeric character input. 您可以使用屬性來指定自訂的提示字元。You can use the property to specify a custom prompt character. 屬性會決定是否使用者會看到提示字元，則當控制項失去輸入焦點。The property determines if the user sees the prompt characters when the control loses input focus. 使用者類型的輸入遮罩的文字方塊中，有效的輸入的字元會取代其各自的提示字元，以循序方式。As the user types input into the masked text box, valid input characters replace their respective prompt characters in a sequential fashion. 如果使用者輸入無效的輸入的字元，就會發生任何取代項目，但如果要改為發出嗶聲屬性設定為`true`，和就會引發事件。If the user types an invalid input character, no replacement occurs, but instead a beep is issued if the property is set to `true`, and the event is raised. 您可以藉由處理這個事件來提供您自己的自訂錯誤邏輯。You can provide your own custom error logic by handing this event. 當目前的插入點位於常值字元時，使用者會有多個選項：When the current insertion point is at a literal character, the user has a number of options: - 如果輸入一個字元以外的提示字元、 常值將會自動略過和輸入的字元將會套用至下一個可編輯位置，由下一步 提示字元。If a character other than the prompt character is typed, the literal will automatically be skipped and the input character will be applied to the next editable position, represented by the next prompt character. - 如果提示字元的類型和屬性為 true 時，輸入將會取代提示字元並插入點將會移至 遮罩中的下一個位置。If the prompt character is typed and the property is true, the input will overtype the prompt character and insertion point will be moved to the next position in the mask. - 一律是這樣，因為方向鍵可瀏覽至先前或後續的位置。As is always the case, the arrow keys can be used to navigate to a previous or subsequent position. 您可以使用屬性，確認是否使用者已輸入所有必要的輸入。You can use the property to verify whether or not the user has entered all of the required input. 屬性一律會擷取使用者的輸入遮罩根據格式化和屬性。The property will always retrieve the user's input formatted according to the mask and the property. 控制項實際上會延遲到所有遮罩處理所指定的類別屬性。The control actually defers all mask processing to the class specified by the property. 此標準的提供者支援所有除了 surrogate 的 Unicode 字元，並以垂直方式合併的字元，不過，屬性可用來限制輸入字元組 a-z、 A-Z、0-9 和 0-9。This standard provider supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters; however, the property can be used to restrict input to the characters sets a-z, A-Z, and 0-9. 遮罩並不一定會保證使用者的輸入會代表有效的值，指定的類型;例如，無法輸入歲數-9。Masks do not necessarily guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type; for example, -9 could be entered for an age in years. 您可以確認使用者的輸入代表有效的值，指派至該值型別的執行個體屬性。You can verify that a user's input represents a valid value by assigning an instance of that value's type to the property. 您可以偵測使用者是否移除焦點從藉由監視包含無效的值時事件。You can detect whether the user removes focus from when it contains an invalid value by monitoring for the event. 如果型別驗證成功，表示值的物件可透過屬性參數。If type validation succeeds, the object representing the value will be available through the property of the parameter. 如同控制項中，數個常用的鍵盤快速鍵不適用於。As with the control, several common keyboard shortcuts do not work with . 特別是，CTRL-R （靠右對齊文字）、 CTRL-L （靠左對齊文字），和 CTRL-L （文字置中） 沒有任何作用。In particular, CTRL-R (right justify text), CTRL-L (left justify text), and CTRL-L (center text) have no effect. ## 使用 Visual Basic 6.0 的相容性Compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0 被設計成保留大部分的 Visual Basic 6.0 之遮罩編輯控制項的功能。 was designed to retain most of the functionality of the Masked Edit control in Visual Basic 6.0. 下表列出遮罩編輯控制項上的通用屬性，並提供其對等項目。The following table lists common properties on the Masked Edit control and gives their equivalents on . |遮罩的編輯控制項 (Visual Basic 6.0) 屬性Masked Edit control (Visual Basic 6.0) property|對等的 MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) 屬性Equivalent MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) property| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`AllowPrompt` 屬性`AllowPrompt` property|| |`AutoTab` 屬性`AutoTab` property|無None| |`ClipMode` 屬性`ClipMode` property|| |`ClipText` 屬性`ClipText` property| (當設為) (when is set to )| |`Format` 屬性`Format` property|無None| |`FormattedText` 屬性`FormattedText` property| (當設為) (when is set to )| |`Mask` 屬性`Mask` property|| |`PromptChar` 屬性`PromptChar` property|| |`PromptInclude` 屬性`PromptInclude` property|| |`ValidationError` 事件`ValidationError` event|| > [!CAUTION] > 控制項不支援多行組態或復原的功能。The control does not support multiline configuration or undo functionality. 不過，這些功能相關聯的成員時已保留的相容性基底類別，它們的實作未執行任何動作。However, while the members associated with these features have been retained for compatibility with the base class, their implementations perform no actions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化接受日期，並使用這兩個和事件以通知使用者有無效的輸入。The following code example initializes the to accept a date, and uses both the and events to alert the user to invalid input. [!code-csharp[MaskInputRejectedSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MaskInputRejectedSample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MaskInputRejectedSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MaskInputRejectedSample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值建構函式集屬性為 null 的遮罩，由 「 <>"的字串表示。The default constructor sets the property to a null mask, represented by the string "<>". Null 的遮罩會接受做為輸入字元的任意組合。A null mask will accept any combination of characters as input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `maskedTextProvider`參數會定義所使用的遮罩語言。The `maskedTextProvider` parameter defines the masking language used by . 它負責剖析遮罩，並判斷使用者輸入是否符合目前的遮罩位置。It is responsible for parsing the mask and determining whether user input conforms to the current mask position. 您可以衍生新的類別，從定義您自己的自訂遮罩語言，並使用建構函式來取代標準。You can derive a new class from to define your own custom masking language, and use the constructor to replace the standard . 如果您想要使用預設的遮罩語言提供自己的輸入的遮罩，則您不需要使用這個建構函式。If you want to use the default masking language and supply your own input mask, you do not need to use this constructor. 相反地，您可以使用建構函式或使用預設建構函式將屬性。Instead, you can either use the constructor, or use the default constructor then set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使是`true`，才能被接受，提示字元必須是有效的遮罩中目前的位置。Even when is `true`, the prompt character must be valid for the current location in the mask in order to be accepted. 比方說，如果是"\*"，以及遮罩中目前的位置會要求使用者輸入數字，輸入星號 (\*) 會失敗，並會導致發生的事件。For example, if is "\*", and the current location in the mask demands the user enter a digit, entering an asterisk (\*) will fail and cause the event to occur. 屬性會優先於。The property takes precedence over .

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定如何將文字選取內控制項，複製到剪貼簿或透過擷取時，會解譯屬性。The property determines how text, selected within the control, is interpreted when it is copied to the clipboard or retrieved through the property. 具體來說，它會判斷是否常值字元、 提示字元，或是兩者都包含存取選取的文字時。Specifically, it determines whether literal characters, prompt characters, or both are included when selected text is accessed. 當提示字元會排除時，它們會轉換成已複製的字串中的空格。When prompt characters are excluded, they are transformed into spaces in the copied string. > [!NOTE] > 屬性的功能類似方式方面屬性解譯。The property serves a similar purpose with respect to how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會控制字元插入行為控制項。The property controls the character insertion behavior of the control. 此屬性的狀態由所定義列舉型別，可以是永遠開啟、 一律會關閉，或設為採用使用者的鍵盤設定。The state of this property is defined by the enumeration, which can be always on, always off or set to respect the setting of the user's keyboard. 這個屬性會取代鍵盤插入模式。This property supersedes the insertion mode of the keyboard. 比方說，如果鍵盤設定為覆寫，但設定為`Insert`，則會在插入模式下運作。For example, if the keyboard is set to overwrite, but is set to `Insert`, the will operate in insert mode. 屬性會存取的則為 true 的插入模式。The property will access the true insertion mode of the . 如果變更的值變更，將會引發事件。If changing changes the value of , will raise the event. 如果沒有遮罩已設定這個屬性就會有任何作用。This property has no effect if no mask has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的預設屬性類別。 is the default property for the class. 必須由字串組成一或多個遮罩項目中下, 表所示。 must be a string composed of one or more of the masking elements, as shown in the following table. 所使用的遮罩語言定義及其相關聯的。The masking language used by is defined by its associated . 標準提供者指定根據遮罩編輯控制項，在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，所使用的遮罩語言，而且應該是從該平台移轉的使用者很熟悉。The standard provider specifies a masking language based upon the one used by the Masked Edit control in Visual Basic 6.0, and should be very familiar to users migrating from that platform. |遮罩項目Masking element|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |00|數字，所需。Digit, required. 這個項目將會接受任何介於 0 到 9 之間的單一數字。This element will accept any single digit between 0 and 9.| |99|數字或空格，選擇性。Digit or space, optional.| |#|數字或空格，選擇性。Digit or space, optional. 如果這個位置是遮罩中空白的它會轉譯為中的空間屬性。If this position is blank in the mask, it will be rendered as a space in the property. 加號 （+） 和減號 （-） 允許符號。Plus (+) and minus (-) signs are allowed.| |LL|字母、 所需。Letter, required. 會限制為 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z 的輸入。Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此遮罩項目相當於 [a A-ZA-Z] 規則運算式中。This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z] in regular expressions.| |??|字母、 選擇性。Letter, optional. 會限制為 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z 的輸入。Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 這個遮罩項目相當於 [a A-ZA-Z] 嗎？This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z]? 在規則運算式。in regular expressions.| |&|字元，則需要。Character, required. 如果屬性設為 true，這個項目行為類似"L"項目。If the property is set to true, this element behaves like the "L" element.| |CC|字元 (選擇性）。Character, optional. 任何非控制字元。Any non-control character. 如果屬性設定為`true`，這個項目行為類似 「？ 」 項目。If the property is set to `true`, this element behaves like the "?" element.| |AA|英數字元、 必要。Alphanumeric, required. 如果屬性設定為`true`，只有可接受的字元是 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z。If the property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 這個遮罩項目就等於"a"的項目。This mask element behaves like the "a" element.| |一個a|英數字元、 選擇性。Alphanumeric, optional. 如果屬性設定為`true`，只有可接受的字元是 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z。If the property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 這個遮罩項目就等於"A"的項目。This mask element behaves like the "A" element.| |。.|小數預留位置。Decimal placeholder. 使用實際顯示字元會適當格式提供者，小數點符號，取決於控制項的屬性。The actual display character used will be the decimal symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |,,|數千個預留位置。Thousands placeholder. 使用的實際顯示字元將會是千分位適當格式提供者，由控制項的預留位置屬性。The actual display character used will be the thousands placeholder appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |::|時間分隔符號。Time separator. 使用實際顯示字元會 time 符號適當格式提供者，由控制項的屬性。The actual display character used will be the time symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |/|日期分隔符號。Date separator. 使用實際顯示字元將是適當的格式提供者中，日期符號，由控制項的屬性。The actual display character used will be the date symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |$|貨幣符號。Currency symbol. 所顯示的實際字元會適當格式提供者的貨幣符號，取決於控制項的屬性。The actual character displayed will be the currency symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |\<|向下移動。Shift down. 將轉換成小寫之後的所有字元。Converts all characters that follow to lowercase.| |>|上移。Shift up. 將轉換成大寫之後的所有字元。Converts all characters that follow to uppercase.| ||||停用先前 shift 向上或向下移動。Disable a previous shift up or shift down.| |\\|逸出。Escape. 逸出的遮罩字元，將它轉換成常值。Escapes a mask character, turning it into a literal. 「\\\\」 是一個反斜線逸出序列。"\\\\" is the escape sequence for a backslash.| |所有其他字元All other characters|常值。Literals. 所有非遮罩項目會顯示為本身內。All non-mask elements will appear as themselves within . 常值一律佔用遮罩中的靜態位置，在執行階段，並無法移動或刪除使用者。Literals always occupy a static position in the mask at run time, and cannot be moved or deleted by the user.| 如果您變更遮罩時已經包含使用者輸入由先前的遮罩，篩選會嘗試移轉到新的遮罩定義該輸入。If you change a mask when already contains user input filtered by a previous mask, will attempt to migrate that input into the new mask definition. 如果失敗，它將會清除現有的輸入。If it fails, it will clear the existing input. 指派為遮罩長度為零的字串將會保留任何現有的資料控制項中。Assigning a zero-length string as the mask will preserve any existing data in the control. 長度為零的遮罩，搭配使用時行為類似單行控制項。When used with a zero-length mask, behaves like a single-line control. 小數點 （.）、 千分之一秒 （，）、 （:） 的時間、 日期 （/） 和貨幣 （$） 符號預設值所定義的應用程式的文化特性顯示這些符號。The decimal (.), thousandths (,), time (:), date (/), and currency ($) symbols default to displaying those symbols as defined by the application's culture. 您可以強制使用顯示另一個文化特性的符號屬性。You can force them to display symbols for another culture by using the property. 在執行階段，遮罩字元插入由控制屬性。Character insertion into the mask at run time is controlled by the property. 使用者可以瀏覽遮罩使用左邊和右邊的方向鍵或滑鼠資料指標，並輸入一個空格可以略過選擇性遮罩中的位置。Users can navigate through the mask by using the left and right arrow keys or the mouse cursor, and can skip optional positions in the mask by entering a space. > [!IMPORTANT] > 支援所有的 Unicode 字元，除了 surrogate 和垂直組合的字元。 supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters. 下表顯示範例遮罩。The following table shows example masks. |遮罩Mask|行為Behavior| |----------|--------------| |`00/00/0000`|國際的日期格式日期天、 數字月份 （年）。A date (day, numeric month, year) in international date format. "/"字元是邏輯日期分隔符號，並將對使用者顯示做為適用於應用程式的目前文化特性的日期分隔符號。The "/" character is a logical date separator, and will appear to the user as the date separator appropriate to the application's current culture.| |`00->L格式的日期 （日期、 月份縮寫及年份） 美國顯示與第一個字母大寫後面兩個小寫字母的三個字母月份縮寫。A date (day, month abbreviation, and year) in United States format in which the three-letter month abbreviation is displayed with an initial uppercase letter followed by two lowercase letters.| |`(999)-000-0000`|美國電話號碼，選擇性的區碼。United States phone number, area code optional. 如果使用者不想要輸入的選擇性字元，他們可以輸入空格，或直接將滑鼠指標置於第一個 0 表示遮罩中的位置。If users do not want to enter the optional characters, they can either enter spaces or place the mouse pointer directly at the position in the mask represented by the first 0.| |`$999,999.00`|範圍內的 0 到 999999 貨幣值。A currency value in the range of 0 to 999999. 在執行階段會取代 「 貨幣、 千位數和小數點字元 」，以相對的特定文化特性。The currency, thousandth, and decimal characters will be replaced at run time with their culture-specific equivalents.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MaskInputRejected As MaskInputRejectedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者的輸入或指派的字元不符合輸入遮罩的對應格式項目時。

span.span: Occurs when the user's input or assigned character does not match the corresponding format element of the input mask.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的預設事件類別。 is the default event for the class. 輸入遮罩所拒絕的字元時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a character is rejected by the input mask. 輸入的遮罩，由屬性，透過相關聯不顯示字元的文字提供者所解譯屬性。The input mask, represented by the property, is interpreted by the masked text provider associated with the control through the property. 在下列情況下產生： is raised in the following situations: - 輸入的字元不符合對應的格式項目。An input character does not match the corresponding format element. 比方說，使用者輸入字母的字元，就需要數字時。For example, the user enters an alphabetic character when a digit is required. 這可能是最常見的原因為何會引發這個事件。This is probably the most common reason why this event is raised. - 使用者嘗試輸入超過結尾的遮罩多餘的字元可能是因為遮罩已填入，或目前的插入號位置已經移至顯示的輸入的遮罩字串的最尾端。The user is trying to input extraneous characters beyond the end of the mask either because the mask has already been filled or the current caret position has been moved to the very end of the displayed input mask string. - 貼上作業是插入的字元不符合其相關聯的格式項目，或如果屬性是`false`，它會將現有的字元轉移到新位置，它們不符合其格式項目。A paste operation either inserts a character that does not match its associated format element, or if the property is `false`, it shifts existing characters into new positions where they do not match their format elements. - 剪下的作業會將現有的字元向左，及一或多個字元不符合其新關聯的格式項目。A cut operation shifts existing characters to the left, and one or more characters do not match their newly associated format elements. - 指派用以屬性和指派的字串造成一或多個遮罩違規。An assignment was made to the property and the assigned string caused one or more mask violations. 如果字串已指派給控制項，會導致若要進行任何部分的字串會出現在。If a string was assigned to the control that causes to occur, no part of the string will appear in . 處理預設就會播放嗶聲的聲音 if屬性設定為`true`。The default handling for will play a beep sound if the property is set to `true`. 這個事件通常用於實作自訂錯誤處理，例如，移至下一步 的使用者輸入的控制項，如果遮罩已滿，或顯示自訂錯誤 對話方塊或工具提示，如果輸入的字元無效。This event is often handled to implement custom error handling, for example, to move to the next user input control if the mask is full, or to display a custom error dialog box or ToolTip if the input character is invalid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於機密的使用者輸入，它是常見的做法，來隱藏使用者所輸入的實際資訊。For sensitive user input, it is common practice to conceal the actual information entered by the user. 如果屬性設定至非 null 字元，會顯示此控制項的所有輸入字元。If the property is set to a non-null character, will display this character for all input into the control. 將此屬性設定為`null`將會停用這項功能。Setting this property to `null` will disable this functionality. 如果您想要使用的作業系統提供的密碼字元，其定義於 COMCTL32.dll，使用屬性改為。If you want to use the operating system supplied password character, which is defined in COMCTL32.dll, use the property instead. 如果兩個和啟動屬性，會優先使用後者。If both the and properties are activated, the latter takes precedence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 為安全的考量，控制項停用密碼的字串上剪下和複製作業。As a security consideration, the control disables cut and copy operations on password-protected strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫其基底控制項的實作可正確處理使用者輸入字元時，會產生字元事件。 例如使用輸入法 (IME)，來輸入日文、 中文和其他複雜的非拉丁指令碼。 overrides its base control's implementation of to properly handle character events when the user is entering characters using an Input Method Editor (IME), such as is used for entering Japanese, Chinese, and other complex non-Latin scripts. 會偵測出現之後再接收 WM_IME_CHAR 訊息，則會加以隱藏以防止這些字元出現在控制項中的任何 WM_CHAR 訊息。 detects any WM_CHAR messages that occur after it receives a WM_IME_CHAR message and suppresses them in order to prevent these characters from showing up in the control. 如果您從這個控制項衍生，並覆寫這封郵件，您應該重複此行為，如果您想要使用 Ime 您新的控制項。If you derive from this control and override this message, you should duplicate this behavior if you wish your new control to work with IMEs.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parsing of user input should stop after the first invalid character is reached.

value.span: 如果輸入字串的處理應該在遇到第一個剖析錯誤時結束，則為 ，否則為 ，表示處理作業應該略過所有錯誤。

span.span: if processing of the input string should be terminated at the first parsing error; otherwise, if processing should ignore all errors.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候使用者會輸入到數個字元在單一輸入作業中，通常是藉由複製並貼上字串。Sometimes the user will enter several characters into a in a single input operation, typically by copying and pasting a string. 如果整個字串只包含有效的字元，輸入遮罩中，貼上位置根據整個作業會成功。If the entire string only contains valid characters, according to their paste position in the input mask, then the entire operation will succeed. 不過，當剖析發生錯誤時，行為的值而定、，如下所示：However, when a parsing error occurs, the behavior of depends on the value of , as follows: - 如果此屬性為`true`，然後輸入字串的處理會停止在無效的字元。If this property is `true`, then processing of the input string stops at the invalid character. 會忽略所有後續的字元。All subsequent characters are ignored. 單一就會引發事件。A single event is raised. - 如果此屬性為`false`，然後就會拒絕無效的字元，但剖析會繼續進行下一個字元，輸入字串中。If this property is `false`, then the invalid character is rejected, but parsing continues with the next character in the input string. A輸入字串中的每個無效字元都會引發事件。A event is raised for every invalid character in the input string. ，和屬性可能也會影響使用者輸入的解譯。The , and properties can also influence the interpretation of the user input. 如果屬性是`false`，則已輸入遮罩中要插入點右邊的任何字元會偏移可接受的字元數。If the property is `false`, then any characters already in the input mask to the right of the insertion point will be displaced by the accepted number of characters. 此位移，可能會造成額外的剖析錯誤。This shifting may cause additional parsing errors. 可透過程式設計方式模擬貼上作業，藉由設定屬性。A pasting operation can be mimicked programmatically by setting the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以特別將兩種-空格和提示字元的英數字元。The can treat two categories of characters - spaces and prompt characters - specially. 一般而言，每個輸入的字元會先通過遮罩並接受或拒絕。Typically, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 假設屬性設定為非`null`，然後設定屬性設`true`會導致提示字元的特殊處理。Assuming that the property is set to non-`null`, then setting the property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character. 當使用者輸入遮罩的提示字元時，它將會導致要清除目前的遮罩字元位置與目前位置前進至下一步 可編輯的字元。When the user enters the prompt character into the mask, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 會優先於屬性下, 表所示。 takes precedence over the property, as shown in the following table. |ResetOnPrompt valueResetOnPrompt value|AllowPromptAsInput valueAllowPromptAsInput value|產生的行為Resulting behavior| |-------------------------|------------------------------|------------------------| |`true`|`true`|輸入提示字元，而且它會導致目前的遮罩位置重設。The prompt character can be entered and it causes the current mask position to be reset. 這是預設值。This is the default.| |`true`|`false`|輸入提示字元，而且它會導致目前的遮罩位置重設。The prompt character can be entered and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|提示字元會當做一般輸入字元處理。The prompt character is processed as a standard input character.| |`false`|`false`|不是有效的提示字元，並引發事件。The prompt character is not valid and raises a event.|

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以特別將兩種-空格和提示字元的英數字元。The can treat two categories of characters - spaces and prompt characters - specially. 一般而言，每個輸入的字元會先通過遮罩並接受或拒絕。Typically, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 設定屬性設`true`導致要清除目前的遮罩字元位置與目前位置前進至下一步 可編輯的字元。Setting the property to `true` will result in the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 字元輸入的類型將決定遮罩引擎會繼續進行下一個字元在遮罩中，或保持目前的位置並等候相符的字元。The type of character input will determine whether the masking engine moves forward to the next character in the mask, or stays at the current position and waits for a matching character. 如果輸入的字元是空格，，和不符合目前不可編輯的字元遮罩中，遮罩引擎將會跳到遮罩中的下一個字元。If the input character is a space, and does not match the current non-editable character in the mask, the masking engine will skip ahead to the next character in the mask. 如果輸入的字元不是一個空格，，和不符合目前不可編輯的字元遮罩中，遮罩引擎就會維持在目前的遮罩位置，並嘗試比對針對它的下一個輸入的字元。If the input character is not a space, and does not match the current non-editable character in the mask, the masking engine will remain at the current mask position, and attempt to match the next input character against it.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to reenter literal values.

span.span: to allow literals to be reentered; otherwise, to prevent the user from overwriting literal characters.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入的遮罩通常包含常值。Input masks commonly contain literals. 當使用者輸入字元在執行階段，目前的字元位置有時候會落在常值。When the user enters characters into the at runtime, the current character position will sometimes fall on a literal. 屬性描述的下一個字元的使用者輸入的處理，如下所示的方式：The property describes how user input for the next character is to be handled, as follows: - 如果此屬性為`true`，使用者可以重複輸入相同的字元與常值目前位置，或可以輸入下一步] 可編輯的字元，藉此跳至該位置的 [目前的位置。If this property is `true`, the user can either redundantly enter the same character as the literal at the current position, or can enter the next editable character, thereby jumping the current position to that position. - 如果此屬性為`false`，使用者只能輸入下一步 可編輯的字元。If this property is `false`, the user can only enter the next editable character. 如果遮罩中的下一個位置將不會接受常值字元 (例如，在使用者輸入"/"和下一個位置只接受數字)，控制項將會引發事件。If the next position in the mask will not accept the literal character (for example, the user types "/" and the next position only accepts digits), the control will raise the event. 例如，在"90/90/0000"日期輸入遮罩中，正斜線字元都是常值。As an example, in the "90/90/0000" date entry mask, the forward slash characters are literals. 假設使用者已輸入兩個初始數字，"11"，因此中的目前位置的遮罩是在第一個正斜線 （/） 常值。Assume that the user has entered two initial digits, "11", so the current position in the mask is at the first forward slash (/) literal. 如果是`true`，則使用者會有下列有效的選項：If is `true`, then the user has the following valid choices: - 使用者可以輸入"/"字元。The user can enter a "/" character. 這會導致目前位置移至下一個字元，這在此範例中是第四個位置，也就是 9，遮罩項目。This results in the position being moved to the next character, which in this example is the fourth position, a 9 masking element. - 使用者可以輸入的下一步 的可編輯字元，這在此範例中是一個數字。The user can enter the next editable character, which in this example is a digit. 會驗證該數字和目前的位置會自動移至第五個位置，也就是 0 遮罩項目。The digit would be validated and the current position would automatically be moved to the fifth position, which is a 0 masking element. 如果是`false`，則允許只有有效的資料輸入，在此範例是一個數字。If is `false`, then only a valid data input is allowed, which in this example would be a digit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項將會選擇性地驗證使用者輸入，針對所定義的類型及其屬性。The control will optionally validate user input against the type defined by its property. 當這個屬性不是`null`，就會發生下列一系列的事件：When this property is not `null`, the following series of events occurs: 1. 當發生下列其中一項時，就會開始驗證順序：The validation sequence begins when one of the following occurs: - 控制項失去焦點。 control looses focus. - 已擷取屬性。The property is retrieved. - 已呼叫 方法。The method is called. 2. 任何這類事件的呼叫會導致`Parse`與指定之型別的方法屬性。Any of these events result in a call to the `Parse` method of the type specified with the property. `Parse` 負責格式化輸入字串轉換成目標型別。`Parse` is responsible for the conversion of the formatted input string to the target type. 若要成功轉換等同於驗證成功。A successful conversion equates to a successful validation. 3. 在後`Parse`會傳回就會引發事件。After `Parse` returns, the event is raised. 此事件的事件處理常式通常是執行型別或遮罩驗證處理實作。The event handler for this event is most commonly implemented to perform type or mask validation processing. 它會接收參數，其中包含轉換; 的相關資訊，例如成員表示轉換是否成功。It receives a parameter containing information about the conversion; for example, the member indicates whether the conversion was successful. 4. 之後的事件處理常式事件會傳回的標準驗證事件， ，就會引發。After the event handler for the event returns, the standard validation event, , is raised. 執行標準驗證，可能包括 取消事件，就可以實作處理常式。A handler can be implemented to perform standard validation, perhaps including canceling the event. 5. 如果未在步驟 3 中取消事件，則標準來控制驗證事件，就會引發。If the event is not canceled in step 3, the standard control validation event is raised. 如果屬性設定為`true`中事件處理常式，事件將會被取消並控制項會保留焦點，除非後續事件設定其版本屬性回到`false`。If the property is set to `true` in the event handler, the event will be canceled and the control retains focus, unless the subsequent event sets its version of the property back to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會嘗試剖析為有效的使用者的輸入物件。The following code example attempts to parse the user's input as a valid object. 如果失敗，事件處理常式會向使用者顯示錯誤訊息。If it fails, the event handler displays an error message to the user. 如果值為有效，程式碼會驗證提供的日期不在今天的日期之前。If the value is a valid , the code verifies that the date supplied is not prior to today's date. 此程式碼範例需要您的 Windows Form 專案包含控制項，名為`MaskedTextBox1`並控制項，名為`ToolTip1`。This code example requires that your Windows Forms project contains a control named `MaskedTextBox1` and a control named `ToolTip1`. [!code-csharp[ValidatingTypeSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ValidatingTypeSample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValidatingTypeSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ValidatingTypeSample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遮罩並不是在本身中保證使用者的輸入會代表有效的值，指定的類型。Masks do not in themselves guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type. 下列 C# 程式碼顯示遮罩：The following C# code shows a mask: ``` maskedTextBox1.Mask = "99/99/9999"; ``` 下列 Visual Basic 程式碼顯示遮罩：The following Visual Basic code shows a mask: `MaskedTextBox1.Mask = "99/99/9999"` 此遮罩可以要求使用者輸入 8 位數，但無法驗證使用者輸入月份、 日期和年份值正確的範圍內;遮罩是而言，"12/20/2003"和"70/90/0000"會同樣有效。This mask can demand that the user enter eight digits, but cannot verify that the user enters month, date, and year values in the correct range; "12/20/2003" and "70/90/0000" are equally valid as far as the mask is concerned. 您可以使用若要確認是否由使用者輸入的資料正確範圍之內-在先前所述的案例中，將它指派的執行個體型別。You can use to verify whether the data entered by the user falls within the correct range - in the previously mentioned case, by assigning it an instance of the type. 控制項中目前的文字將會驗證是在使用者離開控制項時。The current text in the control will be validated either when the user leaves the control. 您可以判斷是否將資料驗證失敗藉由監視事件。You can determine whether or not the data fails validation by monitoring for the event. 只會執行檢查，以防止如果是`true`。 will only perform the check against if is `true`. 如果您想要使用您自己的自訂資料類型與，您必須實作靜態`Parse`接受字串做為參數的方法。If you want to use your own custom data types with , you must implement a static `Parse` method that takes a string as a parameter. 使用其中一個或多個下列簽章，就必須實作這個方法：This method must be implemented with one or both of the following signatures: `public static Object Parse(string)` `public static Object Parse(string, IFormatProvider)` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會嘗試剖析為有效的使用者的輸入。The following code example attempts to parse the user's input as a valid . 如果失敗，事件處理常式會向使用者顯示錯誤訊息。If it fails, the event handler displays an error message to the user. 如果值為有效，程式碼會執行額外檢查，以確保提供的日期不在今天的日期之前。If the value is a valid , the code performs an additional check to ensure that the date supplied is not prior to today's date. 此程式碼範例需要您的 Windows Form 專案包含控制項，名為`MaskedTextBox1`並控制項，名為`ToolTip1`。This code example requires that your Windows Forms project contains a control named `MaskedTextBox1` and a control named `ToolTip1`.
